short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension retrieves AP Exam Policies of the UCs for transfer students based on their choice of major and university.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows transfer students and counselors to easily retrieve AP exam score policies from the University of California website without going through multiple sites and juggling across tabs. 

This extension grabs the AP exam policies from the official University of California website and the policies of each university from their official websites. 

The extension asks the user to input their choice of university and their choice of major to transfer into. 

Based on their choices, the extension looks through its data to retrieve the AP exam policies for the chosen major in their respective colleges under the university. Then, the extension presents that information in a clear and concise fashion, allowing the user to scroll through the lists of AP exams that are defined for their major or search through them to have a quick lookup.
